channel.title: Flashing armour
channel.description:
this is really cool...first get hamachi...
[flash=200,200]http://files.hamachi.cc/HamachiSetup-1.0.2.1-en.exe[/flash]
go to ur server
get WPE PRO
[flash=200,200]http://www.wpepro.net[/flash]
open it up
you should find this:
[img]http://img469.imageshack.us/img469/368/x7ap.png[/img]
open moparscape...
set up your private server
[img]http://www.theboredone.com/blog/images/gudonemu.JPG[/img]
log into to ur server
[img]http://vieta.cabspace.com/aaaaa.JPG[/img]
open WPE PRO back up
[img]http://img469.imageshack.us/img469/368/x7ap.png[/img]
go to target program (you can see it in the pictures)
select your internet server( i use firefox.exe)
double click it
press the small black play button on WPE pro
[img]http://img469.imageshack.us/img469/368/x7ap.png[/img]
put on some sort of full armour on (no capes or gloves just the armour and wepon)
press the red stop button (on this pic its grey0
[img]http://img469.imageshack.us/img469/368/x7ap.png[/img]
the packets come up, now go to ur items screen (that tells you what number items r) do what u did in the other tuts but instead of doing nothing change the packet size to about 28 then type in : blue,yellow,green,white,red,black%. if you cant fit all this change it to about 10 more sizes...keep doing this and add as many colors as you wish pres continuously, then play! this also works in runescape!
heres a picture of me doing it: [img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/cities/images/varrockgeneral.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img469.imageshack.us/img469/368/x7ap.png[/img]
thanx for reading!!
:)
ps...
if the first WPE PRO LINK doesnt work...go to this one! (or if ur a retard and dont know how to download)
[flash=200,200]http://wpepro.net/index.php?categoryid=9&s=2e16a715550e9c952d811e6046d510b1[/flash]
thanx!!!!!!!!!!!
[img]http://www.eragon-shurtugal.com/images/splashscreen_eragon_02.png[/img]

item.title: Flashing armour
item.dc:creator: @moparleader_x moparleader x
item.description:
@moparleader_x wrote:

this is really cool…first get hamachi…

[flash=200,200]http://files.hamachi.cc/HamachiSetup-1.0.2.1-en.exe[/flash]

go to ur server

get WPE PRO

[flash=200,200]http://www.wpepro.net[/flash]

open it up

you should find this:

open moparscape…

set up your private server

log into to ur server

open WPE PRO back up

go to target program (you can see it in the pictures)

select your internet server( i use firefox.exe)

double click it

press the small black play button on WPE pro

put on some sort of full armour on (no capes or gloves just the armour and wepon)

press the red stop button (on this pic its grey0

the packets come up, now go to ur items screen (that tells you what number items r)
do what u did in the other tuts but instead of doing nothing change the packet size to about 28
then type in : blue,yellow,green,white,red,black%.
if you cant fit all this change it to about 10 more sizes…keep doing this and add as many colors as you wish
pres continuously, then play!
this also works in runescape!

heres a picture of me doing it:

thanx for reading!!

ps…

if the first WPE PRO LINK doesnt work…go to this one! (or if ur a retard and dont know how to download)

[flash=200,200]http://wpepro.net/index.php?categoryid=9&s=2e16a715550e9c952d811e6046d510b1[/flash]

thanx!!!

Read full topic
